review: This place is not suitable for family and couples.fake pics are provided here.dirty rooms and not maintained at all. Overpriced and no facility. Pics given here are of Zara resort,some other guest house.the location is nice though.
name: Deepshikha A

review: This hotel is not suitable for families at all. Only backpackers can manage with it. Rooms are small, washrooms, kitchen, dinning places are extremely dirty. They unethically use a poor Nepali kid as hotel boy. Me and my wife booked it for 3 nights and moved to KMVN hotel just after staying one night. We booked through an online agent where pictures of other hotels are shown and he charged much more than actual tariff. Never go for online booking. Rooms in this hotel are always available  and are much cheaper than it shows online.  BEWARE OF THE FRAUD ONLINE AGENT.
name: das_nab

review: This is the worst hotel in Munsiyari. Poor rooms, poor service, poor management and it was a awful experience. It is quite expensive too (while booked via online). Please avoid this hotel as anyone can find very good hotels in Munsiyari.
name: GobindaGKhan

review: Situated at View Point, Main Market Road, Pithoragarh, Munsyari, Uttarakhand, Offers accommodation in Girgaon. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. All rooms come with a TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a seating area for your convenience. Each room has a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Rooms are neat and clean. They have restaurant and 24-hour front desk. May be a good choice for family. Staff are well behaved. 24 Hour Power Supply. Location is also good. They have 16 deluxe and executive rooms in 2 floors.
name: KALYAN R
